mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.fuli_name as fuliName ,a.fuli_types as fuliTypes ,a.fuli_content as fuliContent ,a.fuli_time as fuliTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_address as yonghuAddress ,yonghu.yonghu_time as yonghuTime ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yonghu.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes
FROM fuli a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.fuli_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fuliName},'%')
and a.fuli_types = #{params.fuliTypes}
and a.fuli_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fuliContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.fuli_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.fuliTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.fuli_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.fuliTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuAddress},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeEnd})
and yonghu.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yonghu.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
